summary: a selection of around 40 multi-coloured crazy hair for females.
descriptionHtml:
I made these so that you can pick multi-coloured hairs most with intricate designs, that you cannot make by just colouring the hair in race-menu. The basis being that soon science will be able to program hair cells to grow an array of pigments, so I thought if we can do it in this world, then surely the Elder-scrolls world can magically summon something similar up.

To get them onto characters in the game you can use apachii hairs on ncp, which you can find on the links below.

ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_4-10168-1-4

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D10168&pUp=1

to install, just place files over existing apachii hairs female mod [which you need installed before], the folder structure is the same as the apachii one, so it will just overwrite some of the existing files in that mod.

[URL=http://s1333.photobucket.com/user/quetz098/media/selectionofhairs_zps18d30c7d.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1333.photobucket.com/albums/w626/quetz098/selectionofhairs_zps18d30c7d.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
_
author: amorphos
